title: Kristián Kolčák
text:
Kristián Kolčák (born 30 January 1990) is a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender who currently plays for <a href="SV%20Stripfing">SV Stripfing</a>.
Career.
Club.
On 18 July 2007, Kolčák made his <a href="Slovak%20Superliga">Corgoň Liga</a> debut in the 4–1 home win against <a href="MFK%20Dubnica">Dubnica</a> at the age of 17.
On 15 July 2017, Kolčák signed for <a href="Kazakhstan%20Premier%20League">Kazakhstan Premier League</a> side <a href="FC%20Aktobe">Aktobe</a>.
